AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND ID LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}

AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
